name: Add member absence in Status Hero from Google Forms responses
description: Every time a Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically look the person up on Status Hero by the email from the form response and add an absence in that day to that member. This example uses the responses in [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12VEpeBjx7aFuZl3nicCdy0xIwkYBZst3UEHn1HrA9ww/edit#gid=839340663).
